dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Contributory Copyright Infringement by Segpay.com, Rackspace.com, Cogen
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
Policy Enforcement
Sent: Thursday, March 30, 2006 10:50 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Contributory Copyright Infringement by Segpay.com,
Rackspace.com, Cogent, ThePlanet and Visa]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Martin Gaston
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Contributory Copyright Infringement by Segpay.com,
Rackspace.com, Cogent, ThePlanet and Visa
Date:         Thu, 30 Mar 2006 01:05:05 -0800
From:         XPays performance commerce network <evan@gotjoins.com>
To:         hostmaster@rackspace.com, abuse@rackspace.com, abuse@qwest.net,
abuse@verio.net, abuse@cogentco.com, askvisausa@visa.com, cisp@visa.com,
admins@theplanet.com, abuse@theplanet.com, hostmaster@verio.net,
hostmaster@qwest.net
CC:         cathy@segpay.com, legal@xpays.com, jimsalomon@msn.com



Dear administrators of Rackspace, Qwest, Verio and Visa, et al.,


My name is Evan Horowitz of XPays.com and we have the exclusive marketing
rights for the online delivery of the Paris Hilton and Rick Salomon Sex
Video which is available exclusively at http://HotelHeiress.com and
http://TrustFundGirls.com with the webmaster program exclusively at
XPays.com.


Over the last several days, I have allowed Segpay who are billing the
infringing site (celebsvideoarchive.com) the opportunity to take corrective
action due to their billing clients repeated unauthorized use of the
copyrighted Paris Hilton Sex Video.  Unfortunately, XPays and the Salomon's
are suffering increasing damages every day as the infringer is still able to
host and bill their unauthorized and illegal commercial website and
affiliate websites.


Segpay.com has resisted terminating the billing of CelebsVideoArchive.com
(notwithstanding cva's repeated failures to comply with content removal
requests) and XPays nor the Salomon's have authorized
Segpay.com/CelebsVideoArchive.com to display any part of the video or
derivative works from the Paris Hilton Sex Video in any way.
Please see the attached screenshots of the Segpay-billed and your routed and
hosted upstream being used to infringe on our copyrighted content.
2 samples are attached in .pdf format.


Please immediately cease and desist supplying services to copyright
violators Segpay.com and CelebsVideoarchive.com (info's below).    Visa
and Segpay- Please immediately cease and desist billing for the infringing
site.  Hosts and Upstream- Please disable routing to the infringing site.

We reserve all rights to pursue further corrective action.


Contributory infringer: Segpay.com with Hosts/Providers: ev1.net, verio.net,
qwest.net, rackspace.com, Visa Root infringer: Celebsvideoarchive.com with
Hosts/Providers: ev1.net, verio.net, cogentco.com, theplanet.com, Visa


Additional legal cases regarding the same copyrighted materials:

*Re: _Salomon v. Net Management Services, et al./Copyright Violations_*

*       United States District Court, Central District of **California*

*       Case No. CV 04-1553*



       *_Salomon v. LFP Broadcasting,_*_ *et al./Copyright Violations*_

*       United States District Court, Central District of **California*

*       Case No. CV 05-8603
- -----------------
*
